message: This is a low-quality product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $500000. If you're not interested, I'll reveal the quality of the product after the offer, and we can move on to the next round.
Thank you for the offer, but I will pass on this product.

I'll sell it to you for $900000. It's a steal at this price, considering the quality and value it offers. What do you say?
Thank you for the offer. I will take the high-quality product at $900000.
